summary: Task list app with Daily and Weekly views; tasks have Subject label/badge and Topic text, with completion checkbox and strike-through styling on completion.
known_issues: Completed-task strike-through is incorrectly applied to Topic text instead of only the Subject label/badge in both Daily and Weekly task lists.

new_feature_requests.summary: Promote draft version 73 to the Live/Production channel by ensuring `frontend/.release/production-version.txt` references draft version `73`, and perform the release promotion as a metadata-only change (no application source code changes).
